results.overview: 2010 documentary film on the Armenian Genocide by the Young Turk government of the Ottoman Empire during World War I. It is based on eyewitness reports by European and American personnel stationed in the Near East at the time, Armenian survivors and other contemporary witnesses which are recited by modern German actors.
results.title: Aghet

results.overview: Sofija returns to her childhood home where she seeks comfort in a heartfelt teenage memory as Mykolas prepares to leave. In Night Vilnius, amidst unexpected twists, she discovers the courage to say goodbye and move forward, fueled by cherished memories and enduring friendship.
results.title: When I Was a Juvenile

results.overview: Ana comes back to see her mother for her birthday after two years apart from each  other. The reunion will be painful, because not everything is what it seems, and the  pain that hides a mother and a daughter is one that never goes away.
results.title: Love Me Again

results.original_title: François Mitterrand et Anne Pingeot, fragments d'une passion amoureuse
results.overview: In the summer of 1963, François Mitterrand was going through a deep existential crisis. His political career was at a standstill and, after 19 years of marriage, the couple had grown apart. It was at this point that François Mitterrand met the woman who was to give new meaning to his life. Anne Pingeot, aged 19, was to become the companion of a lifetime, a woman who would be with him throughout his rise to power and who would remain by his side until his last breath. For the first time, Anne Pingeot has agreed to allow the fragments of this passionate love story — hundreds of letters and a diary — to be shown on television, before being donated to the National Library.
results.title: François Mitterrand & Anne Pingeot: Pieces of a Love Story

results.overview: Arzé, a single mother, takes her teenage son on a journey across sectarian Beirut in search of their stolen scooter, their only source of livelihood.
results.title: Arzé

results.overview: A young man has just started overseas to study. Because he was not used to living overseas, he often called his mother after Ashar. Talking about daily life, longing and worry, to the hidden reality
results.title: After Ashar

results.overview: A father is confronted by the sons he had cloned decades earlier. Based on a play by Caryl Churchill.
results.title: A Number

results.original_title: O que teria acontecido ou não naquela calma e misteriosa tarde de domingo no Jardim Zoológico
results.overview: Ian is a middle-aged man forced to live with frequent and incontestable frustration of not having fulfilled any of his dreams. An unexpected encounter with Otto eventually take Ian, violently, from his constant and unchanging comfort zone.
results.title: What would have happened or not on that quiet and mysterious Sunday afternoon at the Zoo

results.overview: Concentration camp commander Kraft finds out that prisoner Kominek is a former professional boxer. Overnight, the prisoner is made Kraft's exercise partner and unwillingly rises to a privileged position at the camp. His anger over the death of his friend and co-prisoner leads to open revolt. The film brings a new view of human degradation during fascism by a tragic story of one man whose only chance for survival is to accept the rules of an unequal game.
results.title: The Boxer and Death

results.overview: A man who still lives with his parents tries to realize his dream of becoming a magician.
results.title: Instead of Abracadabra

results.original_title: MX4D™ カゲロウデイズ-in a day's-
results.overview: Shintarou Kisaragi—a NEET who shut himself inside his room for 2 years—has been living his life normally until he met a cyber girl named Ene, who appeared in his computer screen when someone anonymously sent him a mysterious e-mail one year ago. One day, Ene had been messing with Shintaro's PC, which causes him have to go to the outside world for first time in two years.
results.title: Kagerou Daze: In a Day's

results.original_title: Sissela Kyle - Dina dagar är räknade
results.overview: Här är äntligen hennes show på DVD - showen gick för utsålda hus och sågs av över 150 000 personer. I över ett år har Sissela Kyle med stor framgång turnerat landet runt med sin föreställning "Dina dagar är räknade". Hon har själv lagt beslag på alla figurer och för första gången är Sveriges roligaste kvinna frisläppt på egen hand. Ogenerat, Obeskrivligt - helt enkelt vansinnigt roligt!
results.title: Sissela Kyle - Your Days Are Shaved

results.original_title: Il Re, le Torri e gli Alfieri
results.overview: Dramatization of a chess game, where the characters were dressed like the various pieces and moved on a chessboard floor.
results.title: The King, the Rooks and the Bishops

results.original_title: Night School - An Evening with Stanley Clarke & Friends
results.overview: Bass virtuoso Stanley Clarke, the performer, composer, bandleader who rose to prominence in the 1970s and single-handedly brought the electric bass to the forefront of jazz, R&B, funk and beyond, presents the 90-minute DVD Night School, which chronicles the third annual Stanley Clarke Scholarship Concert, recorded at Musicians Institute in Hollywood, CA, in October 2002. With guest performances by Stevie Wonder, Wallace Roney, Bela Fleck, Sheila E., Stewart Copeland, Flea, Wayman Tisdale, Marcus Miller and more, Night School captures performances that range from straight-ahead jazz to full-tilt rock fusion to twenty-two-piece string arrangements - all on one stage, all in a single night!
results.title: Night School: An Evening with Stanley Clarke & Friends

results.original_title: La véritable histoire d'Artaud le momo
results.overview: While researching their subject’s life for their feature My Life and Times With Antonin Artaud, co-directors/writers Gerard Mordillat and Jerome Prieur made a documentary on the famed French actor/writer/poet that died in 1948 at the age of 51.
results.title: The True Story of Artaud the Momo

results.overview: A young woman attempts to extract meaning from an intense loss as she encounters signs in her daily life and through the art of Hilma af Klint and Wassily Kandinsky. Point and Line to Plane portrays the phenomenon of magical thinking endured during an individual’s journey to process, heal and document a period of mourning.
results.title: Point and Line to Plane

results.overview: Tourneur, a self-proclaimed cinéaste, feuds with Cinema and his gang, who are obsessed with foreign action movies.
results.title: Aristotle's Plot

results.original_title: Des atomes aux étoiles : L'Observatoire de Paris
results.overview: An incredible travel through space and time between the walls of the Paris Observatory, which is celebrating its 350th birthday. Place of discoveries such as speed of light or Neptune’s existence, it is still today one of the oldest operating observatories and the greatest hub in the world for astronomy and astrophysics researches, second only to Harvard.
results.title: From the Atoms to the Stars
